mods.abstract: Renfro Valley Gatherin' program, 1948-10-31, part 2, as recorded by WLAC, Nashville, TN. Featuring announcer Ken Meeker, host John Lair, and performers Pee Wee Wade Baker, the Mulkey Brothers, and the Coon Creek Girls (unconfirmed). Sponsored by Ballard & Ballard, a CBS syndication originating at WHAS, Louisville, KY.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
